description: A React component named AssistantMessage, which renders a styled message card with header, alert, bullets, and paragraphs. Also includes a SparkIcon subcomponent for an SVG icon.

methods.name: AssistantMessage({ headerText = 'KaviaAI', alertContent, bullets = [], paragraphs = [], showAlertBg = true, })
methods.description: A reusable React component that displays an assistant/help message card with customizable header, alert content, bullet points, paragraphs, and styling options.

methods.name: SparkIcon(props)
methods.description: A functional React component rendering a spark/star SVG icon, used within AssistantMessage for visual decoration.

ctags.name: AssistantMessage
ctags.signature: ({ headerText = 'KaviaAI', alertContent, bullets = [], paragraphs = [], showAlertBg = true, })
